ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Mobster was the gestalt, he broke back up into the Mafia again. BIC: Kracken was struck in the chest. He directs his machine gun to Feline and fires it.

OOC: Mobster was the gestalt, he broke back up into the Mafia again.

BIC: Kracken was struck in the chest. He directs his machine gun to Feline
and fires it. say, to prevent overkill from 5 characters, 15 bullets. Gigas
was hit and fires 3 shots at Feline. Grenade flies into the air to avoid it.
Beholder is struck and spins around to face Feline, throwing a grenade at
her. Horn Drill dodges by ziping around the shots with some great speed...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 18, 2000 1:23 PM
Subject: Re: Death To The Mafia!!!!


> ::Feline::
>
> Smiles and starts firing her plasma rifle at Mafia members and then
> aimed and fired on Mobster.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Havoc/Repressor::
> >
> > Zardus smiles, watching Mobster seperate. He looks down at Feline.
> > "Help is always welcome," he says, firing his automatic rifle at
> one
> > of the Mafia members.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > DevilDuer reaches the CR chambers, dumping Vamprah in one. He sets
> it
> > to put her is stasis lock and orders the autoguns to open fire if
> she
> > comes out.
> >
> > The Alliance bot turns around, running back toward the exit to get
> > more wounded troops.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Havoc laughs as he watches Mobster seperate, rolling out of the way
> > of some shots.
> >
> > He dives again, dropping another bomb at the Mafia, getting low on
> > bombs.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Repressor lands, looking at the Mafia as they seperate.
> >
> > He fires two missiles at the group, looking up to see how Havoc was
> > doing.
>
>
>
>
>
